scene-background-browser.SearchPathsHint: Place all the paths to the folders you want to be included in the token art search.
scene-background-browser.DisableCachingH: Disables caching of token art paths. Saves some memory but greatly impacts the search speed.
scene-background-browser.DisableAutomati: Check to disable automatic popups upon actor creation.
scene-background-browser.FilterMSRDHint: Excludes token variants for tokens with names not included in the D&D 5e Monster (SRD) list.
scene-background-browser.FilterMSRDError: Token-Variant-Art: Token name is not part of D&D 5e Monster (SRD):
scene-background-browser.ActorDirectoryK: Keyboard key that when held will trigger an art select popup when dragging in a token from the Actor Directory.
scene-background-browser.TwoPopupsName: Display separate pop-ups for Portrait and Token art
scene-background-browser.TwoPopupsHint: When enabled 2 separate pop-ups will be displayed upon Actor/Token creation, first to select the Portrait art, and second to select the Token art.
scene-background-browser.TwoPopupsDialog: Apply the same art to the token?
scene-background-browser.KeywordSearchHi: Searches will use both full name and individual words in the name of the actor/token. Words less than 3 characters will be ignored.
scene-background-browser.ExcludedKeyword: This is a list of keywords that will not be included in the search when 'Search by Keyword' is on.
scene-background-browser.enableTokenHUDB: Enable Token HUD button for everyone
If checked will add the Token HUD button for all players. Note: May reveal art unintended for players to see.
scene-background-browser.twoPopupsNoDial: Disable prompt between Portrait and Token art select
Will disable the prompt displayed upon Token/Actor creation when two separate pop-ups setting is enabled.
scene-background-browser.runSearchOnPath: Whe enabled art searches will check both file names as well as folder names along their path for a match.
scene-background-browser.searchFilterMen: Assign filters to Portrait and Token art searches...
scene-background-browser.enableTokenHUDH: Enable extra Token HUD button for selecting token art.
scene-background-browser.alwaysShowHUDHi: The HUD Button will be shown even when no matches have been found.
scene-background-browser.HUDDisplayImage: Disable to display images as a list of their filenames in the HUD.
scene-background-browser.HUDImageOpacity: The opacity of the token previews in the HUD before hovering over them.
scene-background-browser.tokenArtFilterH: Token art will be limited to files that include/exclude these pieces of text or match the provided regular expression.
scene-background-browser.portraitArtFilt: Portrait art will be limited to files that include/exclude these pieces of text or match the provided regular expression.
scene-background-browser.generalArtFilte: These filters will be used when the search is being performed irrespective of the art type (token/portrait).
scene-background-browser.ProfileListener: Token-Variant-Art: Unable to find profile image to assign right-click listener.
